column1: #Text=Samundri ( Urdu , Punjabi : سمندری ) is in Faisalabad District of Northern Punjab , Pakistan .
#Text=Samundri is home to a major grain , whole corn and sugar market .
#Text=Samundri is known for its custom truck painting business an for its sugar cane and other agriculture products .
#Text=Samundri was on a major trade route during the reign of Sher Shah Suri .
#Text=The present site of Samundri city was founded in 1887 as Chak No. 533 G.B.
#Text=Later it was renamed Samundri because of three Hindu mandirs in the area .
#Text=The word Seh means Three in Persian and a Mandir is Sanskrit word for a temple .
#Text=In 1887 there were three Hindu shrines in this area but now what remains of them houses the Government Primary School No 4 .
#Text=Major language used in Samundri is Punjabi .
#Text=You can get into Samundri city by any of the following three main roads :
#Text=There are many colonies and villages around the city .
#Text=Generally getting around is a pretty experience , you get to see a lot more on foot .
#Text=Taxis in Khurrianwala are abundant , popular and generally safe .
#Text=You can find them at Taxi Stand to travel to nearby village or Faisalabad .
#Text=It is always advisable to agree the fare before travelling .
#Text=The cost may go up for foreigners .
#Text=Car hire : Car hire is also a good way of getting around .
#Text=Although road signs and directions are only available in Faisalabad , due to Khurrianwala being a town , It is easy to find your way around .
#Text=Shopping in Almaxi center and City Mall Plaza .
#Text=There are four main bazaars in Samundri around the clock tower .
#Text=Besides this it has many markets related to these main bazaars .
#Text=Anarkali Bazaar is the main commercial market of the city , and Jinnah Market is the oldest .
#Text=Eateries in Samundri feature Punjabi food , including the staples of biryani , samosas , pakoras , naan and haleem any where from the bazaars and market s.
#Text=many old and modern holels are situated .
#Text=Bandhan hotel and marriage hall is on Faisalabad road .
#Text=In the case of an emergency , call police by 15 from any landline phone .
#Text=If you are using a cellphone , dial 911 for police rescue .
#Text=To get an ambulance in case of an emergency , dial 115 from any landline or cellphone .
#Text=If you find yourself in serious trouble and need any type of emergency rescue or help then to dial 1122 .
#Text=The name of the emergency service is " Rescue 1122 " .
